post.text: Unbelievable - North Carolina! Thank you for the unbelievable turnout at High Point University. It is time to bring JOBS back to the United States of America! We will bring JOBS back! I AM WITH YOU - WE will MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Haley
comment.text: Of course the people of North Carolina are dumb enough to support trump. They are dumb enough to put laws of discrimination on the books that cause their state to loose millions in revenue. Good luck getting those jobs back, Trump isn't going to help. He's going to make it worse. Trump is with nobody but himself! Gross!

replies.author: Ian
replies.text: Way to say everybody in North Carolina are dumb!

replies.author: Haley
replies.text: Nowhere in my post does it say everyone. But there sure are good lot of them. They are the only state of 50 to put in laws like that and boy are they paying the price. They're like the dumb dogs that bite the hands that feed them. Sad.

replies.author: Katelyn
replies.text: Having men or boys in girls locker rooms is okay? Sorry no amount of money is worth my childs safety.

replies.author: Haley
replies.text: Being transgender doesn't make someone dangerous.

replies.author: Kylie
replies.text: Holy CockSuckers.It opens the door for dangerous people though.Man takes dump in Men's room.Girls take dumps in Ladies room.Common sense.It has worked for generations.
